original: gsang sngags kyi dam tshig nyams pa la ni gsang sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur ba dang / bla ma la ma gus pa dang / dad pa dang mi ldan pa las ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / yon tan mang po dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi dam tshig nyams pa la ni gsang sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur ba dang / bla ma la ma gus pa dang / dad pa dang mi ldan pa las ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / yon tan mang po dang ldan pa ni /
translated: For those who have damaged the commitments of secret mantra, the spiritual powers of secret mantra will not be accomplished; and because of disrespect for the guru and lack of faith, the commitments will be damaged.🔽Those who possess many good qualities

original: lus kyi spyod pa kun nas bsdams pa dang / ngag 'jam pa dang / shes rab che ba dang / bzo la sogs pa'i rnam pa mang po shes pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi spyod pa kun nas bsdams pa dang / ngag 'jam pa dang / shes rab che ba dang / bzo la sogs pa'i rnam pa mang po shes pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: are restrained in all physical conduct, have a gentle voice, great wisdom, and know many things such as arts and so on.

original: de dag dang mi ldan pas ni dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs par mi nus shing shes par mi 'gyur ba dang gtong ba dang mi ldan pa las ni sems can rnams la phan par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa las ni theg pa chen po'i snod du mi rung ba dang /
analyzed: de dag dang mi ldan pas ni dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs par mi nus shing shes par mi 'gyur ba dang gtong ba dang mi ldan pa las ni sems can rnams la phan par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa las ni theg pa chen po'i snod du mi rung ba dang /
translated: Those who do not possess those are unable to erect the sublime maṇḍala and will not understand it. Because of not being generous, they will not benefit sentient beings; because of not possessing ethical discipline, they are not a vessel of the Mahāyāna;

original: de bzhin du tshad med pa rnam pa bzhi dang mi ldan pa las ni gsang sngags kyi rnal 'byor par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mi ldan pas ni ;
analyzed: de bzhin du tshad med pa rnam pa bzhi dang mi ldan pa las ni gsang sngags kyi rnal 'byor par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mi ldan pas ni ;
translated: Likewise, one who is not endowed with the four immeasurables does not become a mantra yogin, and one who is not endowed with the three doors of liberation🔽does not attain the spiritual power of the deity due to conceptualization.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa las lha'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ba'i phyir na sngom gnas dam tshig ldan pa la //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa las lha'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ba'i phyir na sngom gnas dam tshig ldan pa la //
translated: Therefore, one who abides in the vows and possesses the commitments🔽is a suitable vessel for the mantra vehicle.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis slob ma'i snod brtag par gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis slob ma'i snod brtag par gsungs pa ste /
translated: Thus, these verses state that the disciple's suitability should be examined.

original: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi lta bar sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa'i sems kyis slob ma'i snod brtags te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi lta bar sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa'i sems kyis slob ma'i snod brtags te /
translated: Therefore, yogins and yoginīs, without regard for gain and honor, should examine the disciple's suitability with an unsurpassed attitude for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: dbang la sogs pa bskur bar bya ste /
analyzed: dbang la sogs pa bskur bar bya ste /
translated: They should bestow the empowerments and so forth.

original: gzhan du na dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi bya ba kho na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi bya ba kho na'o //
translated: Otherwise, it is absolutely prohibited because the commitments would be violated.

original: de la gong du rigs skyes gsungs pas ni theg pa chen po'i rigs can du go bar bya ste /
analyzed: de la gong du rigs skyes gsungs pas ni theg pa chen po'i rigs can du go bar bya ste /
translated: Here, by the term born into the family above, one should understand having the Mahāyāna family.

original: 'jig rten pa'i rigs la dgongs nas ni sems can thams cad la phan par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i rigs la dgongs nas ni sems can thams cad la phan par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: If one considers the worldly family, it would not be beneficial for all sentient beings.

original: de ma yin pa nyid du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ma yin pa nyid du shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand it is not that.

original: slob ma dam pa ni rab tu gyur pa ste /
analyzed: slob ma dam pa ni rab tu gyur pa ste /
translated: The excellent disciple is the best.

original: gang zag rnam pa bzhi @180a * //
analyzed: gang zag rnam pa bzhi @180a * //
translated: From among the four types of persons,

original: las rin po che lta bu zhes bya ba'i gang zag go //
analyzed: las rin po che lta bu zhes bya ba'i gang zag go //
translated: it is the person called jewel-like.

original: de ltar gong du gsungs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mang po dang ldan pa'i slob ma ni gong du smos pa'i rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du sdig pa bshags pa dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar gong du gsungs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mang po dang ldan pa'i slob ma ni gong du smos pa'i rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du sdig pa bshags pa dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
translated: Thus, the disciple who possesses the many collections of good qualities mentioned above, having confessed misdeeds, gone for refuge to the Three Jewels, and generated the thought of awakening, as mentioned above,🔽is made to take up the correct vow in the Vajra Vehicle and is made to take up the observance of the vows, and so on.

original: rdo rje theg pa la khas yang dag par 'ches par bya ba dang / sngom pa gzung ba la sogs pa byed du bcug / me tog gam rin po che thogs te /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa la khas yang dag par 'ches par bya ba dang / sngom pa gzung ba la sogs pa byed du bcug / me tog gam rin po che thogs te /
translated: Having taken up a flower or a jewel,🔽one should say, You should not show this to those who lack the vows.

original: dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i phyir zhugs par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i phyir zhugs par bya ba nyid do //
translated: One should enter in order to be initiated into the maṇḍala.

original: aom badzra h'um ja /🔽badzra sa ma ya pra be sha h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra h'um ja / badzra sa ma ya pra be sha h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra hūṃ jaḥ.🔽Vajra samaya praveśaya hūṃ.

original: aom badzra p'a ni pra t'i tstsha badzra satva ma h'a su kha h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra p'a ni pra t'i tstsha badzra satva ma h'a su kha h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra pāṇi pratīccha vajrasatva mahāsukha hūṃ.

original: ha ha hos ma ya stvam /
analyzed: ha ha hos ma ya stvam /
translated: Ha ha ha hoḥ.

original: me tog gi phreng ba dor nas /
analyzed: me tog gi phreng ba dor nas /
translated: Having cast the flower garland,🔽one should bind it to the head with the mantra and mudrā of the deity upon which it falls.

original: gang la bab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas mgo la bcing bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i cho ga ste /
analyzed: gang la bab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas mgo la bcing bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i cho ga ste /
translated: This is said to be the rite of entering the maṇḍala.

original: de la dang por bsnyen pa byas pa'i bum pa nas chu blangs nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
analyzed: de la dang por bsnyen pa byas pa'i bum pa nas chu blangs nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
translated: Therein, first having taken water from the vase of approach, one should expel obstructors with the mantra of Trailokyavijaya.

original: de nas rdo rje thal mo nas bzung ste /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje thal mo nas bzung ste /
translated: Then, holding the vajra palms together,

original: sngags dang pos gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags dang pos gzhug par bya'o //
translated: one should enter with the first mantra.

original: de nas sngags gnyis pas me tog la sogs pa'i phreng ba dor te /
analyzed: de nas sngags gnyis pas me tog la sogs pa'i phreng ba dor te /
translated: Then, with the second mantra, one should cast the flower garland, etc.

original: rigs kyi rjes su mchon pa las de'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi me tog gi phreng ba mgo la bcing bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: rigs kyi rjes su mchon pa las de'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi me tog gi phreng ba mgo la bcing bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: One should show the family, and place the flower garland of the seal and mantra on his head.

original: de nas dam tshig sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas dam tshig sbyin par bya ste /
translated: Then one should give the pledge:

original: aom rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dkyil 'khor 'di ma mthong ba'i mdun du smra bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: aom rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dkyil 'khor 'di ma mthong ba'i mdun du smra bar mi bya'o //
translated: O son of good family, you should not speak of this maṇḍala in the presence of those who have not seen it.

original: gal te khyod kyis su dag la smras par gyur na ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu 'bar bas khyed kyi mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te khyod kyis su dag la smras par gyur na ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu 'bar bas khyed kyi mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you should speak of it to anyone, the Blessed Vajrapāṇi himself will split your head with a blazing, blazing vajra.

original: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um phat tri ta h'um aa /
analyzed: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um phat tri ta h'um aa /
translated: Oṃ vajra-samaya hūṃ phaṭ triṭ hūṃ aḥ.

original: 'dis dam tshig gi chu blud la gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis dam tshig gi chu blud la gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: With this, one should give the pledge water and remove the blindfold.

original: aom badzra tsakshu dri shya ho //
analyzed: aom badzra tsakshu dri shya ho //
translated: Oṃ vajra-cakṣuḥ vīra hūṃ.

original: a'a dzny'a na pa ta le mo ksh'a ya mi h'um /
analyzed: a'a dzny'a na pa ta le mo ksh'a ya mi h'um /
translated: A jñāna-pāṭala-mokṣaya mi hūṃ.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang / sangs rgyas thams cad bstan par bya zhing /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang / sangs rgyas thams cad bstan par bya zhing /
translated: Then one should show the Blessed Vajrapāṇi and all the buddhas:🔽 🔽This is the Blessed Vajrapāṇi, the great being, the general of the yakṣas, the lord of the maṇḍala.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni las kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni las kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa ste /
translated: The statement one should confer empowerment in the presence of the Bhagavat is a statement of the sequence of the rite.

original: de la dang por dam tshig gis mna' bsgag pa'i phyir tsandan la sogs pa'i @180b dri chu la /
analyzed: de la dang por dam tshig gis mna' bsgag pa'i phyir tsandan la sogs pa'i @180b dri chu la /
translated: There, first, in order to bind by oath, one should anoint with water of sandalwood, etc.

original: aom badzra aa mri ta ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra aa mri ta ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya h'um /
translated: Om vajra-amrta-tathagata-samaya hum.

original: zhes pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs par bsngags la /
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs par bsngags la /
translated: One should enchant with this mantra one hundred and eight times, etc.

original: gong du gsungs pa'i tshig gi 'og tu de'i mtha'i sngags kyis chu blud par bya ba ni mna' bsgag par bya'o //
analyzed: gong du gsungs pa'i tshig gi 'og tu de'i mtha'i sngags kyis chu blud par bya ba ni mna' bsgag par bya'o //
translated: After the words stated above, one should give water with the mantra at the end of that, and one should bind by oath.

original: de nas bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer bskyed pas de'i ma rig pa'i ling tog bsal bar bsams te /
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer bskyed pas de'i ma rig pa'i ling tog bsal bar bsams te /
translated: Then, one should generate oneself as Bhagavat Vajrapani, and one should imagine that the eye-covering bandage of ignorance is removed.

original: aom rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyang ni //
analyzed: aom rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyang ni //
translated: Om, Vajrasattva himself

original: de ring khyod kyi mig 'byed mdzad //
analyzed: de ring khyod kyi mig 'byed mdzad //
translated: today opens your eyes.

original: rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa'i //
analyzed: rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa'i //
translated: The unsurpassed vajra eye

original: mig rnams thams cad dbye bar bya //
analyzed: mig rnams thams cad dbye bar bya //
translated: opens all eyes.

original: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / 'og tu bshad pa'i sngags kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / 'og tu bshad pa'i sngags kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: With this verse and the mantra explained below, the blindfold is removed.

original: de nas brtan par byas pa bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad rim pa ji lta ba bzhin bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas brtan par byas pa bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad rim pa ji lta ba bzhin bstan par bya'o //
translated: Then, having stabilized it, one should show the Bhagavān Vajrapāṇi and all the deities of the maṇḍala in their respective places.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar dbang bskur bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar dbang bskur bar bya ba ni /
translated: Then, in front of the Bhagavān Vajrapāṇi, the empowerment is conferred.

original: aom badzra p'a ni sa yan te aa nu r'a ga to aa bti shinytsa h'um /🔽aom badzra badzra aa bhi shinytsa sarba badzra aa bhi she ka h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra p'a ni sa yan te aa nu r'a ga to aa bti shinytsa h'um / aom badzra badzra aa bhi shinytsa sarba badzra aa bhi she ka h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-pāṇi samayantrapto’dhiṣṭhitaṃ hūṃ.🔽Oṃ vajra vajrābhiṣiñca sarva-vajra-abhiṣekaṃ hūṃ.

original: aom buddha aa bhi shinytsa sarba buddha aa bhi she ka aom h'um /
analyzed: aom buddha aa bhi shinytsa sarba buddha aa bhi she ka aom h'um /
translated: Oṃ buddha-abhiṣiñca sarva-buddha-abhiṣekaṃ oṃ hūṃ.

original: aom ratna aa bhishinytsa h'um tr'am /🔽aom padma aa bhishi nytsa sarba padma aa bhisha ka hr'i:/
analyzed: aom ratna aa bhishinytsa h'um tr'am / aom padma aa bhishi nytsa sarba padma aa bhisha ka hr'i:/
translated: Oṃ ratna-abhiṣiñca hūṃ traṃ.🔽Oṃ padma-abhiṣiñca sarva-padma-abhiṣekaṃ hrīḥ.

original: aom karma aa bhi shinytsa sarba karma aa bhi she ka aa zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: aom karma aa bhi shinytsa sarba karma aa bhi she ka aa zhes gsungs te /
translated: Oṃ karma-abhiṣiñca sarva-karma-abhiṣekaṃ a.

original: de la dang por bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis slob ma'i spyi bor padma dkar po'i steng du gnas par bya ba ni sngags dang por byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: de la dang por bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis slob ma'i spyi bor padma dkar po'i steng du gnas par bya ba ni sngags dang por byin gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: First, the Blessed One Vajrapāṇi himself should be placed on a white lotus above the disciple’s head, which is the consecration of the first mantra.

original: de nas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin gong du smos pa ltar bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i 'khor los sgyur bas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin gong du smos pa ltar bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i 'khor los sgyur bas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Then, in due order, as mentioned above, the five Sugata cakravartins should confer consecration in the proper places.

original: de la 'dir ni sngags gnyis pa las rigs kyi mtshan lan gsum du smos pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i phyir dang / de nyid rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir rigs kyi mtshan lan mang du smos pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'dir ni sngags gnyis pa las rigs kyi mtshan lan gsum du smos pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i phyir dang / de nyid rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir rigs kyi mtshan lan mang du smos pa'o //
translated: Here, the repeated mention of the name of the family in the second mantra is for the consecration in the maṇḍala of the Blessed One Vajrapāṇi, because he is the chief of the vajra family, and because he is consecrated as the cakravartin of the vajra family, the name of the family is mentioned many times.

original: de bzhin du sngags gzhan rnams la'ang rigs kyi mtshan lan gnyis su smos pa rigs nye bar mtshon pa dang / sangs rgyas dang @181a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngags gzhan rnams la'ang rigs kyi mtshan lan gnyis su smos pa rigs nye bar mtshon pa dang / sangs rgyas dang @181a * //
translated: Likewise, in other mantras, the name of the family is mentioned twice, indicating the family and the deity.🔽

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ma lus pa'i tshogs dang gnyis su smos pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ma lus pa'i tshogs dang gnyis su smos pa'o //
translated: Likewise, the other mantras also have the name of the family mentioned twice, in order to indicate the family, and the two mentions of “all” are for the sake of including all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: de la gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa ni gong du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su mi gsung la 'dir gsungs pa ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
analyzed: de la gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa ni gong du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su mi gsung la 'dir gsungs pa ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
translated: Now, one might wonder why all the tathāgatas are included in the above [mantras] but not mentioned in the maṇḍala, and why they are mentioned here.

original: de la gong du gsungs pa rnams ni las kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya la 'di ni de dag thams cad brtan par byed pa'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la gong du gsungs pa rnams ni las kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya la 'di ni de dag thams cad brtan par byed pa'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
translated: The above [mantras] are called the “maṇḍala of action,” and this [maṇḍala] is called the “maṇḍala of the great seal” because it stabilizes all of them.

original: de nas bdag gi lus la sogs pa yon du phul la bka' nod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bdag gi lus la sogs pa yon du phul la bka' nod par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should offer one’s body and so forth as a gift and receive the command.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she ka / ae k'and'a ma sya mi gri hna badzra pra siddha ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she ka / ae k'and'a ma sya mi gri hna badzra pra siddha ye sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata abhiṣeka eka ānanda asya mi gṛhaṇa vajra prasiddhaya svāhā.

original: de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug cing dngos grub thams cad kyang sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug cing dngos grub thams cad kyang sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni /
translated: Then, one should cause him to perform all activities and grant all powers.

original: 'di ltar bka'i dbang bskur bar bya bar gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bka'i dbang bskur bar bya bar gsungs pa ste /
translated: Thus, it is said that one should confer the empowerment of the command.

original: de la bdag nyid rang 'dod pa'i lha'am ;
analyzed: de la bdag nyid rang 'dod pa'i lha'am ;
translated: For that, one should generate oneself as one's chosen deity

original: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer bskyed la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer bskyed la /
translated: or as Bhagavat Vajrapāṇi.

original: thugs kyi sa bon las 'od zer spros pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs te /
analyzed: thugs kyi sa bon las 'od zer spros pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs te /
translated: Light rays emanate from the seed syllable in the heart, inviting all tathāgatas of the three times.

original: bdag dang gnyis su med par gyur pa la /
analyzed: bdag dang gnyis su med par gyur pa la /
translated: They become nondual with oneself.

original: lag tu rdo rje byin nas gong du bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams bton te /
analyzed: lag tu rdo rje byin nas gong du bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams bton te /
translated: The vajra is given into the hand, and the verses explained above are recited.

original: sngags de nyid kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngags de nyid kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: One should confer empowerment with that very mantra.

original: de la sngags kyi don ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' gcig tu gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de la sngags kyi don ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' gcig tu gyur pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the mantra is that the command of all tathāgatas becomes one.

original: bzung ba las rdo rje lta bur grub par gyur cig ces pa'o //
analyzed: bzung ba las rdo rje lta bur grub par gyur cig ces pa'o //
translated: From the retention, may it become accomplished like a vajra.

original: de las 'dir dbang gzhan rnams rdzogs par ma bstan pa ni gong du khyab par byung ba rdo rje'i skabs su gsungs pa las dgongs nas ma gsungs te /
analyzed: de las 'dir dbang gzhan rnams rdzogs par ma bstan pa ni gong du khyab par byung ba rdo rje'i skabs su gsungs pa las dgongs nas ma gsungs te /
translated: The reason that the other initiations are not fully taught here is that they are not taught with the intention of being taught in the section on the vajra, which has already occurred above.

original: 'dir yang gong du gsungs pa'i bum pa'i dbang dang / phyag rgya dang phreng ba la sogs pa thams cad rdzogs par dbang bskur bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir yang gong du gsungs pa'i bum pa'i dbang dang / phyag rgya dang phreng ba la sogs pa thams cad rdzogs par dbang bskur bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: Here, all the initiations of the vase, the seal, the rosary, and so forth, which were taught above, are to be fully conferred.

original: de la gang dag de ltan ni bde bar gshegs pa'i dbang dang bka'i dbang yang gong du mtshon pa las shes par byas pas chog gi 'dir bstan pa la dgos pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: de la gang dag de ltan ni bde bar gshegs pa'i dbang dang bka'i dbang yang gong du mtshon pa las shes par byas pas chog gi 'dir bstan pa la dgos pa med do zhe na /
translated: In that case, since the initiation of the Sugatas and the initiation of the word have already been illustrated above, it is sufficient to understand them from there, and there is no need to teach them here.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gang du dbang gi skabs su bab pa ni dbang thams cad mtshon par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor @181b thams cad kyi dbang la dang por ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi dbang gis mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: gang du dbang gi skabs su bab pa ni dbang thams cad mtshon par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor @181b thams cad kyi dbang la dang por ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi dbang gis mtshon pa ste /
translated: When the occasion of the initiation has arrived, in order to illustrate all the initiations, the initiation of the Sugatas is illustrated first in all the mandalas.

original: dper na gang du 'bras bu gsum gyi sman gtong ba ni /
analyzed: dper na gang du 'bras bu gsum gyi sman gtong ba ni /
translated: For example, when a medicine of the three myrobalan fruits is administered,

analyzed: aa ru ra thogs shig ces pa'i sgras skyu ru ra la sogs pa'ang brtag dgos pa bstan pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as the word “myrobalan” implies the need to examine such things as the kuṭaja fruit.

original: yang 'dir bka'i dbang ni khyab par byung ba'i rdo rjer ma gsungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang 'dir bka'i dbang ni khyab par byung ba'i rdo rjer ma gsungs pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, here the consecration is not mentioned in the all-pervading vajra,

original: 'dir bstan par bya ba kho na ste /
analyzed: 'dir bstan par bya ba kho na ste /

original: mi 'gal ba nyid do //
analyzed: mi 'gal ba nyid do //
translated: This is not contradictory.

original: de'i phyir dbang thams cad rdzogs par ston pa'ang yang dang yang sbyor ba'ang nyes pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba dang / dang po tsam ma smos na'ang dbang ji ltar bskur pa mi shes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang thams cad rdzogs par ston pa'ang yang dang yang sbyor ba'ang nyes pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba dang / dang po tsam ma smos na'ang dbang ji ltar bskur pa mi shes pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, even if all consecrations are taught in detail, repeatedly applying them would be a fault, and if only the first is mentioned, since it is not known how the consecration is to be performed,

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par ma gsungs shing dang po tsam smos par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par ma gsungs shing dang po tsam smos par shes par bya'o //
translated: it should be understood that all maṇḍalas are not taught in detail, but only the first is mentioned.

original: de nas las thams cad kyang byed du gzhug cing dngos grub thams cad kyang sbyin no zhes pa ni bka'i rjes thogs su las kyi dbang bskur bar bya ba dang / dad pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma la dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i byin gyis rlabs chen pos byin gyis brlab par bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: de nas las thams cad kyang byed du gzhug cing dngos grub thams cad kyang sbyin no zhes pa ni bka'i rjes thogs su las kyi dbang bskur bar bya ba dang / dad pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma la dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i byin gyis rlabs chen pos byin gyis brlab par bya ba nyid de /
translated: This is the consecration of activity that follows the consecration of the word, and the consecration of the disciple endowed with faith by the great blessing that accomplishes all powers.

analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po'i don bstan par bya'o /

analyzed: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi las thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa ni /

original: bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom byas nas //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom byas nas //

original: snying gar h'um zhes bya bsams na //

analyzed: khro bo stobs chen rnams bsgoms te / snying gi dbus su phat ces pa //

original: phyag rgya chen pos byed par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen pos byed par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: That very [deity] abides in the manner of the single seal, and all activities are performed by the great seal of the four seals.

original: de yang gang du phrin las bzhi yis bsdus pa'i las kyi sbyin sreg ni phyag rgya gcig pas rnal 'byor du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i tshogs kyi skabs su ni /
analyzed: de yang gang du phrin las bzhi yis bsdus pa'i las kyi sbyin sreg ni phyag rgya gcig pas rnal 'byor du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i tshogs kyi skabs su ni /
translated: Moreover, the fire sacrifice that subsumes the four activities is performed by the yoga of the single seal, and in the context of the assembly of offerings,

analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i rnal 'byor gyis byed pa kho na ste /

analyzed: de la / de nas bde ba bskyed nas kyang //
translated: Then, having generated bliss,

analyzed: zhes pa ni /

original: 'dir ni don rnam pa gnyis la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni don rnam pa gnyis la 'jug pa ste /

translated: Previously, in the section on the hosts of offerings,🔽in the center of the four mothers of the families, such as Buddha Lochana, one meditates on the form of Bhagavat Samantabhadra, the great bliss.🔽In the center of the four sattvas, such as Vajrasattva, one meditates on the form of Bhagavat Vajrapani.

analyzed: rin chen rigs kyi mchod pa'i skabs su ni rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa sems dpa' bzhi'i dbus su /
translated: In the center of the four sattvas, such as Vajraratna, one meditates on the form of Bhagavat Lokeshvara.

original: bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs par bsgoms pas mchod par bya ba dang / padma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i skabs su ni rdo rje chos la sogs pa sems dpa' bzhi'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la sogs par bsgoms pas mchod par bya ba dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs par bsgoms pas mchod par bya ba dang / padma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i skabs su ni rdo rje chos la sogs pa sems dpa' bzhi'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la sogs par bsgoms pas mchod par bya ba dang /
translated: In the context of the offerings of the jewel family, one meditates on the Bhagavat Ratnasaṃbhava and so forth, and makes offerings. In the context of the offerings of the lotus family, one meditates on the Bhagavat Amitābha and so forth, and makes offerings.

original: las kyi rigs kyi mchod pa'i skabs su ni rdo rje las la @182b sogs pa sems dpa'i bzhi'i dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa la sogs par bsgoms pas mchod pa bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: las kyi rigs kyi mchod pa'i skabs su ni rdo rje las la @182b sogs pa sems dpa'i bzhi'i dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa la sogs par bsgoms pas mchod pa bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In the context of the offerings of the action family, one meditates on the Bhagavat Amoghasiddhi and so forth, and makes offerings.

original: dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus su ni //🔽zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus su ni // zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: In the middle of the four maṇḍalas,🔽one should meditate on the four families.

original: bde ba bskyed pa ni sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor la bya ste /
analyzed: bde ba bskyed pa ni sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor la bya ste /

original: tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pos bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pos bskyed par bya'o //

original: de ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir snyam pa la /

analyzed: dang por tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pos slob ma gang la byin gyi rlab chen po bskyed pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor rnam 'grub par 'gyur gyis gzhan du ni nus pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir /
translated: First, the four verses generate great blessings for the disciple, and the yoga of the perfect Buddha is accomplished, but not otherwise, because of being powerless.

original: sems can la phan pa'i stobs su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can la phan pa'i stobs su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It does not become the power to benefit sentient beings.

original: de la gang dag 'di skad du phyag rgya bzhi pa nyid dkyil 'khor yin zhing de la 'khor dang mi ldan pa'i phyir rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa la ni dkyil 'khor bzhi'i dbus su zhes bya ba mi rigs so zhe na ma
analyzed: de la gang dag 'di skad du phyag rgya bzhi pa nyid dkyil 'khor yin zhing de la 'khor dang mi ldan pa'i phyir rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa la ni dkyil 'khor bzhi'i dbus su zhes bya ba mi rigs so zhe na ma
translated: To that, some say: The four seals themselves are the mandala, and since it is not endowed with a retinue, it is not reasonable to say “in the center of the four mandalas” for the Vajra family cakravartins and so on.

original: yin te / de dag thams cad la yang phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor re re dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: yin te / de dag thams cad la yang phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor re re dang ldan pa ni /
translated: This is not so, because each of them is endowed with a mandala of the four seals.

analyzed: yig 'bru drug cu rtsa bzhis 'og nas ston par 'gyur zhing /

analyzed: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'o dbus su zhes bya ba kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, it is only “in the center of the four mandalas.”

original: mtshams gcod pa la sogs pa'i skabs sam /
analyzed: mtshams gcod pa la sogs pa'i skabs sam /
translated: At the time of the section on the boundary enclosure,

original: sgo skyong la sogs pa mchod pa'i skabs su ni 'jig rten snang byed la sogs pa khro bo bzhi'i dbus su khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su bsgom par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: sgo skyong la sogs pa mchod pa'i skabs su ni 'jig rten snang byed la sogs pa khro bo bzhi'i dbus su khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su bsgom par bya ba nyid do //
translated: or at the time of the offering to the door guardians, and so forth, one should meditate on the form of the conqueror of the three worlds in the center of the four wrathful ones, such as the illuminator of the world, and so forth.

original: de nas phyogs gzhan du phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i skabs su phyag rgya gcig pa'i gzugs su bsgom par bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nas phyogs gzhan du phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i skabs su phyag rgya gcig pa'i gzugs su bsgom par bya ba ste /
translated: Then, at another time, at the time of the fire sacrifice of the four activities, one should meditate on the form of the single mudra.

original: dkyil 'khor bzhi po'i dbus su zhes pa ni bdag nyid rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su gsol ba dang / de'i yan lag tu gyur pa zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / mngon spyod rnams kyi dkyil 'khor te /

translated: The center of the four mandalas is the great root mandala of oneself, and the mandalas of the branches, which are the pacifying, increasing, power, and destruction.

original: de dag gi dbus su gong du bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin /
analyzed: de dag gi dbus su gong du bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin /
translated: In the center of those, one should meditate on the samadhi explained above.

translated: In the case of the Blessed One Vajrapāṇi, Ratnasaṃbhava, Amitābha, Amoghasiddhi, and Rudra, one should visualize the form of the wrathful conqueror of the three worlds.

analyzed: rgyal ba'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom pa las zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bya ba ste /
translated: From that, one should perform the activities of pacifying, etc.

analyzed: des ni bde bar gshegs pa de dag dang 'dra ba'i phyir las thams cad ma lus par 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: By that, all activities are accomplished without exception, because one becomes like those Sugatas.

original: de la / kun du bzang po bde ba che //
analyzed: de la / kun du bzang po bde ba che //
translated: Samantabhadra, great bliss,

original: bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom pas nas //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom pas nas //
translated: meditating on oneself as

original: snying gar h'um zhes bya bsams nas //
analyzed: snying gar h'um zhes bya bsams nas //
translated: the syllable hūṃ at the heart,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur //
translated: one becomes equal to Vajrasattva.

original: zhes pa ni 'di ltar sku'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'di ltar sku'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is called the “samādhi of the body.”

analyzed: de yang rnam pa gsum mo // gcig ni ltos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: gcig ni rgyu las grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to ;
translated: One is the samādhi called “accomplished from the cause.”

analyzed: / gcig ni 'bras bu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The other is the meditative absorption called “abiding in the result.”

analyzed: de la 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das rgyu las grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du mdzad nas go rims 'di dag gsungs pa ste /

analyzed: de la dang por bdag nyid kyi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /

analyzed: de'i steng du ram las nyi ma'o //

original: de'i steng du h'um bsam mo //
analyzed: de'i steng du h'um bsam mo //
translated: Upon that, visualize a HUM syllable.

analyzed: de ltar gyur pa las rdo rje rtse dgu pa gcig bsam par bya'o //

analyzed: de'i lte ba la yig 'bru dgu po aom dang bcas pa bkod la /

analyzed: de gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po sku mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis yongs su brgyan pa /

analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'am /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang dril bu rol par bsams te /

translated: This is to be done in the context of burnt offerings, in the section on burnt offerings for all activities.🔽In the context of empowerment, it is to be done in the context of the empowerment of the Sugata family,

analyzed: de'i bum pas dbang bskur ba'i dus su bya'o //

analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs la dgab par bya'o //
translated: it is to be done in the Sugata family.

analyzed: de ltar byas pa las nges par bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po nyid dang / khyad par med par 'gro ba'i don byed nus pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud gzhan du'ang gsungs so //
translated: By doing so, one definitely becomes able to perform the welfare of beings without distinction from the Blessed One Samantabhadra himself. This is also stated in other tantras by the Tathagata.

original: h'um las sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur la //
analyzed: h'um las sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur la //
translated: From HUM, transform into the form of the Buddha,

original: snying gar 'khor lo rab bsgoms na //
analyzed: snying gar 'khor lo rab bsgoms na //
translated: and meditate on a wheel at the heart.

original: phyag na @183b rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: phyag na @183b rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur //

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /

analyzed: 'di ltar rang gi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /

analyzed: de'i steng du ram las nyi ma bsams te /

original: de'i steng du h'um bsam mo //
analyzed: de'i steng du h'um bsam mo //

analyzed: da dag gyur pa las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'khor lo lta bu rtse gsum pa gcig bsam mo //
translated: From the transformation of those, one should imagine a three-pointed vajra like a discus, the vajra of the body, speech, and mind of all the buddhas.

original: yang de'i dbus su yig 'bru gsum po bsams la /
analyzed: yang de'i dbus su yig 'bru gsum po bsams la /
translated: Again, one should imagine the three seed syllables in the center of that.

analyzed: de dag yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje sku mdog dkar po bzhin 'dzum pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /

analyzed: phyag g-yas na rdo rje rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa /

analyzed: g-yon skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa bsgom par bya ste /

original: de ni sbyin sreg byed pa'i dbang du byas nas ni /
analyzed: de ni sbyin sreg byed pa'i dbang du byas nas ni /
translated: That is done in terms of the performance of burnt offerings.🔽In the context of performing a peace burnt offering, one should understand

original: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i skabs su shes par bya ba dang / dbang bskur ba'i dbang du byas nas ni /
analyzed: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i skabs su shes par bya ba dang / dbang bskur ba'i dbang du byas nas ni /

analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi bde bar gshegs pas dbang bskur ba dang / rdo rje rigs kyi bum pas dbang bskur ba'i skabs su shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand this in the context of the consecration by the Sugata of the Vajra Family and the consecration by the vase of the Vajra Family.

original: 'od zer spros pa'i dbang du byas nas ni /
analyzed: 'od zer spros pa'i dbang du byas nas ni /
translated: With regard to the consecration in terms of the emission of light rays,

original: rdo rje rigs kyi sems can la dgab par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi sems can la dgab par bya'o //
translated: one should cover the sentient beings of the Vajra Family.

original: de ltar bsgoms pas las ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang gnyis dbyer med par gyur pa las zhi ba'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ni nges pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de ltar bsgoms pas las ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang gnyis dbyer med par gyur pa las zhi ba'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ni nges pa kho na'o //
translated: By meditating in this way, the activity is the accomplishment of all pacifying activities, which is definitely the indivisibility of oneself and the Bhagavat Vajrapāṇi.

original: rdo rje khro bo rnams bsgoms te //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo rnams bsgoms te //
translated: Meditating on the wrathful vajras,🔽and so forth.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ni rang gi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ni rang gi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /

analyzed: de'i steng du ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Upon that, from Raṃ, arises a sun maṇḍala.

original: de dag gi steng du phat:nag po bsams te /
analyzed: de dag gi steng du phat:nag po bsams te /

original: de dag gyur pa las ral gri 'bar ba bsam mo //
analyzed: de dag gyur pa las ral gri 'bar ba bsam mo //

analyzed: yang de'i dbus su yig 'bru bzhi po bsams la /

analyzed: de dag yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba gong du gsungs pa'i kha dog dang cha lugs ci 'dra ba bsgom par bya ste /

original: de ni spyin sreg gi dbang du byas nas ni /
analyzed: de ni spyin sreg gi dbang du byas nas ni /

analyzed: drag po'i las kyi sbyin sreg byed pa'i skabs su shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand this in the context of performing the burnt offering of wrathful action.

analyzed: de dag gi 'od zer la spros pa'i dbang du byas nas ni mtshon cha'i 'od zer spro ba'i skabs su shes par bya'o // dbang gi khro bos 'khor los sgyur ba @184a * //
translated: In terms of the emanation of light rays from them, one should understand this in the context of the emanation of weapon light rays.

analyzed: lnga'i dbang bskur du mi gtub pa'i phyir /

analyzed: 'og nas bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa bsgom par shes par bya'o //

analyzed: de yis ni drag po'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba kho na'o //

analyzed: de'i steng du ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
translated: Upon that, one should visualize a sun maṇḍala arisen from Raṃ.

original: de'i steng du tra ser po bsams te /
analyzed: de'i steng du tra ser po bsams te /

analyzed: de gyur pa las rin po che'o //

analyzed: phyag g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya mdzad par bsgom par bya ste /

analyzed: sbyin sreg byed pa'i dbang du byas nas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i skabs su shes par bya'o //

analyzed: 'od zer spro ba'i dbang du byas nas ni rin po che'i rigs kyi gang zag la dgab par bya ste /

analyzed: de ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan dang dbyer med par 'gyur zhing rgyas pa'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba kho na'o //

analyzed: rdo rjer bsgoms nas snying gi ni //
translated: Meditating on the vajra in the heart,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ni //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ni //
translated: and so forth.

analyzed: 'di ltar rang gi snying gar aa las zla ba bsams la /

analyzed: de gyur pa las padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa gcig bsam mo //

analyzed: dbang gi sbyin sreg byed par shes par bya'o //

analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i dbang du byas nas ni //

analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi bde bar gshegs pas dbang bskur ba dang / padma'i rigs kyi bum pas dbang bskur ba'i skabs su shes par bya'o //

analyzed: 'khor lo rgya gram h'um ldan par //

analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'di ltar rang gi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /

analyzed: de'i steng du ram las nyi ma bsams te / de'i steng du aa h'um gis mtshan pa bsam par bya'o //
translated: On top of that, one should imagine a sun from raṃ.🔽On top of that, one should imagine a syllable marked with a hūṃ.

analyzed: yang de'i lte ba la aom dang bcas pa'i yig 'bru bsams te /

translated: One should meditate on oneself as the Bhagavat Amoghasiddhi, green in color, adorned with all the ornaments, holding a vajra cross in the left hand, and making the gesture of fearlessness with the right hand.

analyzed: de ni dbang bskur ba'i skabs su las kyi rigs kyi bde bar gshegs pas dbang bskur ba dang / las kyi bum pas dbang bskur bar shes par bya ste /
translated: One should understand that at the time of the consecration, the Sugata of the karma family consecrates, and the karma vase consecrates.

analyzed: de ni bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa dang gnyis dbyer med par gyur pa dang / las thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: That is the inseparability of the Bhagavat Amoghasiddhi and oneself, and one engages in all activities.

analyzed: de ltar rim pa de dag gis gang du rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya chen po yid la byed pa thams cad du mngon par sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: In this way, in all mental engagements of the great seal, the yogin should apply these stages.

original: des ni sems can yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las grub pas na /
analyzed: des ni sems can yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las grub pas na /
translated: Since sentient beings are established as the wish-fulfilling gem,
